page.title: 08BROMDON
page.content: Bromdon village is curious and entirely off the road three quarters of a mile down its own driveway. It now functions as a privately owned caravan and camping countryside holiday park. The main buildings house the offices, camp shop and some of the other facilities. Previously the area was communally owned. It was run as a commune community. Though it quite close to Farlow school and certainly within our survey rectangle, the village of Bromdon is unfamiliar to most of the children who undertook our survey.
